website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for quality and value, we recommend the Nonstick Expert set instead.
pros: A large 18-piece set that is available in red and black exteriors
Comes with an square griddle pan
cons: The handles feel flimsy, and the non-stick surfaces are not PFOA free
Cooking with high heat is not recommended

customer_reviews.title: Is it really T-fal?
customer_reviews.text: We are using this set for almost 10 months already and some of the pans are already useless because the nonstick surface started to peel off. I should say that I use only bamboo kitchen utensils, didn't scrub it and didn't fill dirty pan with the water before it's cooled after cooking. I didn't expect such a bad quality from T-fal set, maybe it's a bad replica. I'm really disappointed in this purchase. I attached photos of the pan used the most and the less. As you can see even the latter one has already started to bubble and flake.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: They changed their shape, became narrower after the first use
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. I didn’t think this could happen to t-fal pots. All of them changed their shape after the first use. I don’t understand how. I’m really meticulous and i take good care of my things, of course I didn’t bump the pots around, dropped, hit/kick, nothing like that. I actually kept them like on a cloud although they don’t brake. So with all my love and care they changed their shape, i’d say that they shrunk because they became more narrow that their lids. None of the lids fit anymore
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the pots over 6 months at this point. Everything is still in one piece. No handles falling off or anything. All the pots are still non stick. Still clean well. I do make it a point to try not to scrub the pots with anything abrasive and I have silicone utensils for cooking so my pots are still smooth inside. They cook even get hot quick. I’ve always made do with cheap pots this was my first set of real pots that cost more than 29.99 and I am beyond satisfied with my purchase and can see the clear difference between the cheap pots and these pots.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick peel off leads to health poisoning
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are engineers. Along with many other things, we take good care of our vessels by using wooden utensils.Within 4 months of using these, we found the nonstick coating is peeling off. We thought this is an exception with only one of the pieces and stopped using it. Every month since then we're seeing the nonstick is peeling off for all other pieces too. This is dangerous for human consumption and leads to poisoning. We will not buy TFal again and advise others to avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: Lali G

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don't review these types of products, but this one was decent enough to do so. I'm only giving it 4 stars because on the bottom of the pan there's already scorch marks where i'd expect that sort of thing after a few months of use instead of a couple of uses. Otherwise, the inside is non-stick even if you accidentally forget to wash them overnight and food crusts on decently, it also cooks damn even as well, with a batch of Hamburger Helper not having one bit of a problem. I did get this on Black Friday sales though and I felt like it came off as a steal for the quality to price.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Be careful...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these before I watched “the devil we know” on Netflix. Now I regret not only wasting my money and endangering my family but also supporting corporations that only care about their pockets and to how they mass pollute the world. They switched the chemicals they use to make Teflon, which is just as bad as the original. I am throwing these out and getting something safe for my family to cook our food in.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality, Dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: This item is very bad all the items are losing the t-flon, i have only used the set for 4 months, very bad quality, dont buy!! Im asking for my money back. Update: Amazon didnt help me and was asking for a lot to do for the refund, im thinking about using another company that is not Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Chinese Knock offs?
customer_reviews.text: Another purchaser mentioned that these look like cheap imposters from China and I am inclined to agree. The biggest red flag is that they come in a nondescript cardboard box. I have another set of Tfal pots and pans and they definitely came in a Tfal box. I compared the two pot sets and they’re different, but I cannot be sure that this purchase is an imposter purely by comparison. Since Amazon is not that reliable about policing knock off and extremely cheap and poorly made products that mysteriously break after two months, I would avoid these. Macy’s has the same pot set on sale regularly for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered destroyed, inside undamaged box. Every one bent and unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Unusable. Every pot and pan is bent. Can’t cook, lids don’t fit. No way to use these. Box was undamaged, cardboard inserts were fine. Pots and pans were put into box with extreme damage which is not what the description indicated. Complete waste. No excuse.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Great set at any price
customer_reviews.text: These are a great cookware set. Reminds me of higher prices sets. Heat distribution is perfect. Nothing has been accidently burnt. Super easy to clean even 6 months later. They season wonderfully. Look amazing. My problems? The set came with a slightly dented large sauce pan. Looked like it was dropped. The kid wouldn't stay on. Not a problem just bent it back into place. However, 6 months later the dent came back naturally and the saucepan looks out of place The coating around the screws has scraped off on a few of the pieces. The rest of the pots and pans have held up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these about a year ago and now I am ready for something new. The handles are always loose, and have had to be tightened like 10 times already. They were loose with a few days after purchase. The paint on the outside has bubbled and peeled off in many locations. The bottoms were instantly stained and burnt and no amount of cleaning will make them look good. I mean they cook ok, but I would go for something else.. I am currently looking at replacing these with the Calphalon($133) or Kitchaid(199$) non stick sets.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Walmart off brand is higher quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these a few weeks, use silicone utensils only when cooking and these things look like I've been using them for 3 meals a day for 10 years straight.......they arrived with pain peeling as well as some scratches and damage to the "non stick" coating on the pan. The only thing I wasnt disappointed in is they truly are non stick and clean easy but dang these things look like you gave a 2 year old a steak knife and told them to draw on the pan. Spend $5 more and buy the discounted copper set. These honestly are awful and I think they may be fake and not really t-fal? Idk why else they would be so awful
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Boell

customer_reviews.title: This product is not dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.text: Do not put in dishwasher or it will remove the coating on the bottom. I hand washed in the beginning and after reading the product description that states dishwasher safe I tried the dishwasher only once and it ruined the pan. I’m not sure if the warranty covers this?Product label should not read dishwasher safe. Will change this review if I get any customer support in replacing the pan that was destroyed. Update to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! That skillet is the best piece!
customer_reviews.text: I have a gas stove instead of an electric (finally), and I absolutely love this set of pots and pans. I use the skillet a lot for grilled cheeses, eggs, pancakes, and making quesadillas for the kids. That was the biggest plus about this pots and pans package. The box arrived in perfect condition, all the items were not damaged. They cook great, easy to clean out as well. They are dishwasher safe, I have washed them by hand and also by dishwasher. They held up their color and coating. Don’t hesitate to buy this if you need a new set of pots and pans. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware set for the $$
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these sets 7 months ago (one as a gift for our friends). To date they operate just like they did the day we purchased them. We have had to tighten a handle on a couple of the pots but that was simple and to be expected. The coating on the inside of the pots is still in perfect shape. We don't use metal utensils, they cause scratches and ruin your good cookware. Based on our daily usage of these and the fact that they aren't showing any signs of wear, I believe they will last us for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Frank C

customer_reviews.title: For the money, it's worth it, BUT don't let the riveted handles fool you
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely better than the "cheap" sets they sell at Walmart. The plastic utensils are definitely awesome, but the pans are THIN. They aren't heavy duty material. They are still an okay value tho, because the price is much lower than that of a set this size at walmart or target, of the same quality. Cheaper by about 30-40 bucks, so definitely worth it if you need a lot of pans temporarily. Idk how long they'll last, but I'm guessing, not long. Oh they are SUPER non-stick too, so be careful of your food sliding around lol
customer_reviews.author: Kyah Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but loose handles Already after (4 uses max )
customer_reviews.text: Ok, these look beautiful, very light weight( I like them to be a bit heavier tho...) but not a problem. What I don’t like is that it seems like the handles on a few pans and the pot wiggle a bit. That should be . They are brand new and I’ve used them a few times 4 at max... husband tried to tighten them and it doesn’t tighten at all. So that’s they way they will stay. If this wasn’t an issue I would gladly give a five star . But that’s not the case here . It wasn’t exactly cheap either. This will me make sure to not order TFal again.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee_Sipper15

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set of affordable cookware
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, I love this set. The color is amazing. I unpacked, washed then treated the entire set. I have used every piece except the small skillet and the heat distribution was uniform in each item. Rinsing alone was all that was necessary until I let spaghetti sauce remains sit over night. No big deal. Most came off with rinsing and a quick brush and gone. I have looked for a quality set that didn't cost an arm or a leg, and this is by far the best value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Carver

customer_reviews.title: Low price, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought these based on the T-Fal name and reputation for quality. Buyer beware--cheap price=poor quality! We purchased these as a gift. When opened by the recipient, two pots were so bent the lids didn't fit. We bent them back into shape so that gives you an idea of the quality or lack thereof. Within two months, the handles were coming off the frying pans and the frying pans 'bow' in the center when over heat so everything runs to the outside. Seems like a deal, but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Dartfest

customer_reviews.title: She loves this set!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife. Apparently the kids have burned most of her cookware up and its now garbage!! I know nothing about cookware but i always remembered my moms best cookware had T fal on it. Thats what got me to looking at these. The red color matches the dishes i recently purchased for her so i ordered these and she absolutley loves them. They clean up easy and cook great. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: BoDean

customer_reviews.title: THE LID DOES NOT FIT THE POT! DEFECTIVE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: It is 2 days past our return window and unfortunately we just used the large 5 qt stockpot and THE LID DOES NOT FIT THE POT - THE PRODUCT IS CLEARLY DEFECTIVE!!! We have turned the lid every which way and it still doesn't fit the pot but it did fall into the pot full of burning hot oil at one point and almost burned me! Hoping T-Fal or Amazon will take accountability for shipping us a defective product to begin with and replace this 5qt stockpot ASAP without any additional cost to us. Very disappointed as my family grew up using T-Fal and never expected this lack of quality from them...
customer_reviews.author: Percee Goings

customer_reviews.title: Not made as Strong
customer_reviews.text: My second set of TFAL This set is thinner and one pan was bent that I bent back into place with my bare hands now that is thin My older set much thinker metal material Hope it holds up great price on 18 pc set
customer_reviews.author: David Powell

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean, slightly wiggly handle
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this like 4.5 stars, but can't. I really really like these pans. And I would buy them again. I like that this set comes with 2 smaller sauce pans. SUPER easy to clean. Don't use metal if you can avoid it. We bought rubber whisks and such. (Also, easier to clean.) So here's my one issue. The handles are not designed great. We liked the shape. That's fine. But where the handle connects to the pan, it's a little wiggly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Renfro

customer_reviews.title: T-fal says screw you.
customer_reviews.text: The product shipped and was damaged only 4 pieces were damaged but instead of being willing to replace those pieces or do anything to fix it I got told by t-fal to screw myself unless I wanted to be out of cookware for a week minimum and that they would not do anything else for me. Goodbye tfal and goodbye my business hopefully no one else buys this crappy set and falls for their lies.
customer_reviews.author: michael parise

customer_reviews.title: I did not get the egg wonder pan.
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the 4.5" egg wonder pan. I purchased this product for my mother in law as she absolutely loved the egg wonder pan as it was perfect for making eggs. I ordered this product online and received 5 spoons however no egg pan. I was so disappointed and angry. I can guarantee that I will never purchase this brand of product again. Please rectify this as soon as possible before this ghastly act happens to someone else again.
customer_reviews.author: Joash

customer_reviews.title: worst pots and pans set ever
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and went for it. Boy was I wrong. on of the pots fell and dented, the ridges on the bottom of the pans messed up my stove's top with scratches, don't understand how but now every burner is scratched, and trust me I'm very careful with my stuff so it has been only the everyday wear with these pots and pans. I had my stove for 5 years now and nothing like this ever happened with any other product. DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: marianalockett

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my pots and pans for about a month and I’m glad I bought them. I saw a lot of complaints about the nonstick part of it but I’m guessing it’s bc people didn’t read the directions and didn’t season their pans properly. I seasoned them right out the box and it’s recommended to season them every 10-12 washes. They are doing exactly what they are suppose to do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good...while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. Easy to clean and heat up perfectly! Buy them, you won’t be sorry Update: year and a half into moderate but careful use and the rivet snapped off yielding the pan useless. All of the handles on the entire set became loose and had to be tightened with a screwdriver periodically as well. I’m guessing the warranty is out so I need to find a new set. Will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Pasha

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Cookware arrived on time, no damage or missing items. Cookware was packaged really well. Love the color red. I read the care instructions on how to maintain the quality of items, which is very simple. The set I purchased came with a life time warranty, it maybe standard with T-fal cookware, not sure. The weight of the cookware is lightweight, for example if you fry an egg be aware the pan may slide around on the burner. I wish the weight of the cookware was just a little heavier but still a good price for 18 piece set.
customer_reviews.author: June Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not good. Usually I wait to right a review, maybe I waited too much, anyway this is my opinion about the cooking pan. I was washing this skillet and the handle just broken in my hand, and I am really careful to washing them no use the washing machine. Another thing that boted me a lot is all the time you will need to tight the fridge screw no matter if you use less or more . I am so upset because I searched a lot before bought and I know this brand was really good, maybe no anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rosilene

customer_reviews.title: THE DIRECTIONS WERE FOLLOWED AND I REALLY APPRECIATE IT.
customer_reviews.text: WE GOT THIS GIFT FOR OUR SON THAT LIVES IN FLORIDA. HE WAS IN NEED OF SOME COOKWARE. THE PRICE WAS GREAT AND DELIVERED RIGHT TO HIM. HE WAS VERY HAPPY WITH IT AND USES IT DAILY. THE ON LINE SHOPPING IS+ GREAT AND HONESTLY NO SHOPPING OR SHIPPING. THANKS ALSO VERY PRETTY NOW I NEED TO GET MYSELF SOME.
customer_reviews.author: BERTHA GRUPENHOF

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I just received these pans and haven't seasoned them yet. I know I am going to love them though. I love the ergonomic handles on the pans and the larger and higher nob on the top of the glass tops. The are nice to look at and to hold. I love the tiny pot and frying pan. I will update this when I start using them.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Only had these for about 4 months. Followed the instructions for first time use and have been cleaning them according to the included instructions. Sometimes I just need to wipe the inside of the skillet I use the most with a paper towel to get it clean! No chipping or pealing yet, great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. They are so cheap they will come bent up
customer_reviews.text: After finally receiving my pots and pans every one of them was bent and dented Beyond use. I cannot believe that they even wasted their time shipping these out. I am so pissed off I cannot believe it I have people waiting for them and I promised them they are getting on and now I can't give it to him do you not buy them unless you're buying them for target practice. I'm not just saying this because I'm mad.
customer_reviews.author: mike pearson

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan set.
customer_reviews.text: These are a good value set. Easy to clean and cook great. These will bend if dropped. We have a higher end cookware set also. I bought these to fry/boil eggs. Also, needed extra 1-1/2 and 2-1/2 quart pans when cooking larger meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of Nonstick pans
customer_reviews.text: We've had these pans for a while now, and really I'm as impressed now as I was when we first opened the set. It's a good set with a wide range of sizes and plenty of lids to go around. The non stick holds up really well, though we also make an effort to clean these immediately and we don't put them in the dishwasher. However, that's really not a problem as even handwashing they clean well with a few suds and a little elbow grease. The only issue would be that the handles come loose over time and I've had to add a screwdriver to my kitchen tools so I can tighten things back up every couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Stocks Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: I was a little weary about putting them in the dishwasher because I had bought a set before that said they were dishwasher safe and they were ruined after one wash. But I have no issues with these so far I go wash the multiple times in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Milinda K

customer_reviews.title: I'll never go back to other pans
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. They come clean just by rinsing! My other pans would take a quick soak or a little scrubbing to get off eggs (for example) with these everything comes right off when you run water on it. I have since purchased every T-Fal product and won't go back. They have held up for years. I recommend you buy the ones with the circles inside, not the rough ones.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: T-Fal doesn’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: T-Fal is known as one of the best brands of cookware you can get. This hasn’t disappointed. This set has everything you need for a starter set. I am very impressed. T-Fal doesn’t disappoint. Never sticks, easy to clean and lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Sandr

customer_reviews.title: Tfal??? Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: I just wanna say either the reviews were tainted or i got a bad batch. Pots arent horrible but definitely not normal TFal quality. Along with semi poor quality i was missing the flat fryer from my order. Buyer Beware you've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Set
customer_reviews.text: My wife is pleased! Happy wife, happy life. So easy to clean. Truly personifies the term Non-stick, food literally pours out of them. Color remains intact after multiple washes. Strong, sturdy construction. Fantastic gift or just for because you want them. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a few years, without any complaints. The handles loosen up, here and there. I just tighten them up, and get back to business. I've put this set through the paces, and it has not let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Only good for deep frying - not cooking stew or rice
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them for quite some time now. The biggest problem is these pots burn everything from the bottom and most of the time on top, it is not even boiled yet. This makes it hard to cook rice or stew. But if you wanna deep fry anything, since it is Teflon, it will do the work. it is still nonstick for me after some time using. The other issue is easily scratching, even if you use a wooden spoon or Teflon spoon. So there are many scratches in the pot after some time using it.
customer_reviews.author: Raha

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP JUNK Teflon comes off
customer_reviews.text: One pot after 3 uses started having bubbles in the Teflon. I am an occasional cooker, so these pans haven't seen much use compared to someone who cooks daily. Always washed by hand and used low heat, always used correct utensils. Now 2 years later the majority of this set has Teflon coming loose. So look elsewhere for a set of cookware. Yes, there's a warranty but you have to foot the bill to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Luv Shar Pei

customer_reviews.title: Great amount, great sizes, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter moved so I bought myself a new set and have her the old junk. So far, these pans are nice and work well. Nothing gets super stuck to them which is a plus. I've got 4 years to enjoy them before the next kid moves out!
customer_reviews.author: ratina ouout

customer_reviews.title: Bought For Mom, We Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mom for Christmas. She was so excited! They clean so easily! The color is perfect! I've used the egg griddle every single day since Christmas! Personally my favorite piece in the whole set! Side note. I wish they had come with a note saying to wash before first use. I, having never bought new pans before, didn't know they were supposed to be washed first. The first thing I tried to cook got burned and tasted awful. But that's 100% my fault not the pans, should have washed them. I would highly recommend this product to anyone needing a new set!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Best deal only one thing came missing lid for 3 quart pot. Call them they where very helpful and professional can have sent out the lid was very easy to talk to and deal with .outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Beavers

customer_reviews.title: These pots have some
customer_reviews.text: These pots have some issues, some of "flecks" of None-stick stuff is coming off. I USE these pots, they NEVER been "Burned" or ever been in a dish-washer. I only us the plastic spoons and all that came with the set. OTHER then these this issues, I LOVE THESE. I only worry about these issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ingram

customer_reviews.title: great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have done my best to use each piece at least once since I got them and skillets daily of course, very happy with how well they cook and clean. I have a terrible old electric range top that heats unevenly but these pans do a lot to nullify my poor burners and heat evenly. Think they are a steal at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: If you expect to compromise, they're decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: You're geting a lot of pieces, just keep in mind that these are thin, soft metal, and they bend VERY easily(I'm trying to make the pots round again and can mishape the metal with one finger). The finish will also start to chip in time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: What a great set! My fiancé and I can really tell ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great set! My fiancé and I can really tell the difference between using this cookware set versus our old one. I don't know if it is because of how the bottoms are designed, but it really does make the heat transfer evenly throughout. It makes a huge difference in cooking. My only complaint about this product would be that the red color is slightly different in person. It looks like red with pink tones rather than a flat out red, which I personally do not care for but I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: brendaleigh

customer_reviews.title: FLAKY
customer_reviews.text: Despite proper care. Despite using only the utensils provided, the non-stick coating has begun flaking off. So far this is only happening on the skillet which is the most used of the cookware set that I purchased. This is a huge quality failure which is the reason for my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Clarke

customer_reviews.title: They are great!
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews about this set of dishes before I ordered them. The reviews were so mixed I wasn’t sure what to expect. My set is perfect!! The kids fit perfectly l, the pans were not scratched, warped, or dented. The pans heat evenly on my flat top stove. I love the bigger skillet!! It has 2 handles which makes it super easy to carry. The pan sizes are perfect for my family. I do not regret ordering these pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Bent pots!
customer_reviews.text: The pots came and before I can try them, I saw that two were warped. So I have 4 pieces (pots+covers) that I cannot use!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of pots & pans
customer_reviews.text: This set looks and works great. Used them and washed them in a dishwasher and didn't see any problems. Very happy with them. Just need to see how they hold up over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Al Skorich

customer_reviews.title: Great variety and price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased specifically for 1-red color to match kitchen in vacation home 2-variety in set. 3-price. This delivered on all 3. Compared to several other red cookware sets and happy I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: So fragile Cheap Material
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with the product. Then I dropped it. And it got warped! How cheap is this product! Since it has been more than one month, i can't return it. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Baris T

customer_reviews.title: Great to cook with
customer_reviews.text: Great to cook with, like the measurements etched inside the pots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang For Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: A lot of stuff in this set for the money. I would purchased again but know they will last a very long time. Super easy to clean and dishwasher safe. The utensils in the kit prevent scratches of the cookware. Very impressed with this cookware set.
customer_reviews.author: David Ruder

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pans. I have had them awhile now and through cooking and dishwasher, they are still like brand new. The only way the coating will wear off is if you are using metal on them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything except the fact I’m missing pieces. And the only way to fix it is for me to return items. Then get my refund then reorder. It takes 3-5 business days to get my money back. I paid for 18 pieces. Didn’t get 18. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Quite a bit of cookware for a modest price.
customer_reviews.text: Forme, it's a great set. My old stuff was worn out! (I did send it on to someone who would use it.) This is a great set! If you want higher quality, be prepared to pay significantly more. A nice set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: The red set is pretty but they do not seem so sturdy. Much lighter than I expected. For now I guess they’re ok, but I see myself replacing these quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Good size and color pots
customer_reviews.text: This pot set is nice time will tell with the quality but over all its good. The pots are actual size. And super easy to clean no oil needed to fry eggs. Awersom.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Raiye

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought my set as a used open box set and everything looks great and works great. Perfect price for all that you get. T Fal has been a great brand. My last set lasted us 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Now I can move in.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved it came a day earlier then expected, I just got a new apartment during the virus period and I'm trying so hard not to go out when don't have to. Now I can finally move in now that I can cook. Very nice to use meets our family needs.
customer_reviews.author: dawn Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pot set!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely pleased with my pot set. I purchased two sets, one for me and one for my daughter and we simply love them! Great value and cook your food evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Agent

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: Little on the cheap side, pots are thin and can bend easy. Everything came intact no broken lids. I got the 18 piece red. They work, haven't chipped yet. I have run some pieces through the dishwasher fine. Good first starter set but I was expecting higher quality thicker pots from tfal. They feel as flimsy as the cheap sets you get at Wal-Mart
customer_reviews.author: Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest I have ever had or spent money on. I have learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Guest Love These!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced all the cookware in our 12 cottages and the guests love the new cookware. Pans are solid. Color is great. Teflon is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Ruann Wood-Larson

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I needed new cookware. My old cookware was T-Fal from 1993. Lasted along time. Love the new color red. Love the square frying pan.
customer_reviews.author: Michiele A. Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These pans are the best. Easy to clean. Cook well. They have a convenient little spout to pour out oil etc. They also have measurement markings on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, even in red.
customer_reviews.text: Scared of the red color at first, but after seeing we really like it, its more of a "muted" red. The smallest frying pan is really only big enough for one egg, but the others are a good size. Really like the deep one with the lid. Plastic spoons/spatulas are standard. Cooks well, and have ran through the dish washer several times with no issues, I'm sure it will cause the color to fade after a few years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch and Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: bad quality..
customer_reviews.text: The flat pan warped in the middle the first time it was used,very disappointed, I thought the price would reflect the quality, It was a gift I bought for someone and was embarrased by it.
customer_reviews.author: pamela gillespie

customer_reviews.title: The non stick coating is the best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: The non stick coating is the best I have ever used. Cleaning is almost as easy as just swirling dish soap and water around in the pans. Almost no scrubbing of any kind needed. Stubborn stuff takes just a sponge. Long handles are nice. The included tools are cheap, but they work. The tiny little egg pan is awesome. Perfect for egg sandwiches. And the conductivity of these pans is very good. The directions say to keep the heat lower than normal, they are right.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a while it’s absolutely amazing still is nonstick after six months easy to clean easy to take care of it’s great on my glass top stove
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Broken can opener/lids pot and pans
customer_reviews.text: Okay so the can opener broke the second time I used it and the lids too the pans the same thing they came loose and it takes a special screw driver on one of them I am really truly not happy with this product I really would have done something about this sooner but I’ve used this item and I had this stuff shipped back in February you’re only credit me 10.00 I think too be honest it should be more then that thanks for your time aloha from Janice lane
customer_reviews.author: janice lane

customer_reviews.title: Pots came Bent
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice and I love how big the pots is. I’m only giving this a 3 stars because two of my pots were bent. I took them out the box and noticed the lids wouldn’t fit on them. I’ve seen other reviews where this was a problem and I’m here to say it definitely is. I’m not sure why my pots are bent like this but this should be fixed! immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: better thank excpected would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: i replaced pans stolen from my daughter with these and they are great pans.better than my moms first set of t-fal.they have measurements inside them and reel you when perfectly heated woukd but again
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Swango

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy T Fal again.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same T fal pans for approximately 15 years. They were wonderful. Lately I've noticed the screws that hold the handles on were starting to strip and didn't feel safe to use them etc. So I wanted to purchase something similar. I chose this set. These are fantastically non-stick and easy to clean. That's where the pros end. The first time I used it, the lid cracked on the large pan AND the screw was loose. You can't steam anything in the pans as the lids don't fit properly. This is a terrible set of pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: m.k

customer_reviews.title: pans galore!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my poor, abused set from college. The lids do fit for both the pots and pans in the set, so you don't have to splash around while doing splattering things in the frying pans. One note is that they do recommend you either oil your pans regularly or refrain from putting them in the dishwasher, but even by hand, they've just been wiping clean with a sponge. I'd recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good quality set. Everything cooked on here slides off easily and had almost everything you need. I prefer Teflon over the other coatings due to performance, other coatings don't last as long and stick. I use only plastic cookware in these
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: They are excellent!! 💯 recommend. Very varied set. Beautiful smooth material and color. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Okay until they aren't
customer_reviews.text: I loved them when I first got them but now the handles are slowly becoming looser each use. The Teflon is beginning to come off a few of the pots. Overall decent enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd purchase of T-fal cookware. No, they don't wear out that quickly. In fact, I still have all my other pieces and they are in great shape. I just wanted to have a bigger selection on hand...plus I wanted the red! :)
customer_reviews.author: PJLG

customer_reviews.title: Get em’
customer_reviews.text: I’d trashed my Caphalon, had shoulder surgery and needed lighter pots and pans. I (surprising) love this little set!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Kronstadt

customer_reviews.title: ... is not round but furnished cover is making it useless. Returning tomorrow when post office opens
customer_reviews.text: 24 stew pot is not round but furnished cover is making it useless. Returning tomorrow when post office opens. Three sauce pans was a great idea, Stupid design. As usual Amazon has solved my problem but it' a pain in the but to fit all this crap back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: bill pinson

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, Great quality pans
customer_reviews.text: My fiance gifted me these pans 2 years ago. They still work perfectly and are easy to clean. They're great quality and a really good amount of product for the price. These are the only pans we use to cook with everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this set
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set. Cook well, nice sturdy feel, and clean up easily. Price point is really no more or less than I expected for the pieces included.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Found this set on another site for a higher price, so was very excited to see Amazon Prime option for a lower price! TFal quality in this 18 piece set. My only regret is the other set had a 12" covered deep pan for 'chicken frying', whereas this set includes a 10 3/4" covered deep pan. It still does the job, but it's amazing what that little extra size can hold for large family gatherings! Otherwise, this is still a fantastic set & a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Stephy M

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of cookware
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a set of these products before and I can’t seem to get away. Great set of cookware
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Martin

customer_reviews.title: Bought used said very good condition pan was crushed
customer_reviews.text: Item was bought used it said slight damage I don’t consider crushed slight. 2 of the kids were also damaged
customer_reviews.author: Mathew M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price - pots may warp
customer_reviews.text: I really do love these pots! They look great and are easy to clean. My only complaint is that after 3 months of use one if the pots has warped. We hand wash only and dont use high heat so I'm not sure what caused it.
customer_reviews.author: amunoz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love them. So easy to clean dishwasher safe. Great Quality.
customer_reviews.author: JnSTreen

customer_reviews.title: poor constuction
customer_reviews.text: We are forced to tighten that nuts that hold the handles couple of times a month on several items. The flat skillet is hideous on non stick although I will say several of the skillets do a great job with non stick. In general the clean up nice enough. Not something I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Best decision EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy with this set!!! It really is easy to cook with, the food Slides right off the pan, and cleaning it is a breeze!!! As long as you use mediumish heat, I feel this product will last a VERY long time!!! I was searching through MANY different pan sets and I’m SO glad I bought this one!!! I HIGHLY recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: maria wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: Great set of pits and pans
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a new set and I love this TFal. It is so easy to clean and it is a very good looking set.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rennels

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Cookware
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for less than two years. I've only used plastic, bamboo or silicone spatulas and spoons and the coating is deteriorating to the point of requiring replacement. The pans are warped and difficult to use. All in all I am pretty disappointed with this purchase and will likely not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Garbage poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Received brand new with all the handles loose and falling off. T-Fal said to ship to them so they can inspect...yeah they need to do better than that.
customer_reviews.author: nash

customer_reviews.title: A tad light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Just a little too lightweight but for the price it is definitely what I expected. It’s for a second kitchen in my basement so it won’t be used often. If you use it for your primary kitchen I would suggest a heavier set.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Southard Purdue

product_meta.title: T-fal, Dishwasher Safe Cookware Set, 18 Piece, Red Initiatives Nonstick Inside
product_meta.description:
Size:18-Piece| Color:Red

T fal B165SI Initiatives Nonstick Inside and Out Dishwasher Safe 18 Piece Cookware Set, Red. T fal Initiatives Nonstick Inside and Out Dishwasher Safe 18 Piece Cookware Set, Red, This set includes 3 qt. Saucepan, 1 qt. Saucepan with Lid, 8" Frying Pan, 2 qt. Saucepan with Lid, 5 qt. Stockpot, Slotted Spoon, Spoon, 10" Skillet with Lid, 4 qt. Stockpot, 11" Frying Pan, Slotted Turner.
feature_bullets: Set includes: 3 quart; Saucepan, 1 quart; Saucepan with Lid, 8 inches Frying Pan, 2 quart; Saucepan with Lid, 5 quart; Stockpot, Slotted Spoon, Spoon, 10 inches Skillet with Lid, 4 quart; Stockpot, 11 inches Frying Pan, Slotted Turner
Dishwasher safe: Exceptionally durable dishwasher safe cookware for easy clean up
Durable nonstick interior: Durable non stick interior for easy cleaning and cooking
Even heat base: Delivers even heat distribution for reliable cooking results
Nonstick exterior: A breeze to clean, ceramic cooking surface resists heat upto 570 degree fahrenheit
Comfortable handle: Ergonomic comfortable grip; Oven safe upto 350 fahrenheit /177 celsius

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
